name: convert_url_to_image
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cloudlayer_io.
Tool description: Generate PDFs, Images, and more from HTML and URLs
API description: Make a GET request to convert url to image, accepts simple options as query strings in URL (use POST endpoint for advanced options).

url.description: The URL to be converted to an image.

timeout.description: The request timeout in milliseconds. Defaults to None.
